name: Gate Breaker
text: Your strikes against objects are especially vicious.
prerequisites: Str 13, Improved Sunder, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.
benefit: Whenever you would deal damage to an object, you deal normal damage plus an additional amount equal to your Strength modifier. This applies to both unattended objects and those you damage as part of a successful sunder combat maneuver check.
text_zh: 你对物体的打击格外有效。
prerequisites_zh: 力量13，精通破武，猛力攻击，BAB+1。
benefit_zh: 当你对物体造成伤害时，你在通常伤害之外额外造成等同于力量调整值的额外伤害。这既适用于无主物体，也适用于成功的破武战技造成的伤害。
